title: "creating empty arrays"
output: html_notebook
---

https://stackoverflow.com/a/32023090/5270873

```{r}
# create empty array
empty <- array(numeric(),c(2,3,0)) 
empty
```

```{r}
# attempt to add a matrix to the array
empty[,,1] = matrix(1:6, nrow=2, ncol=3)   # error because 1st slice does not exist
# Error in `[<-`(`*tmp*`, , , 1, value = 1:6) : subscript out of bounds
```



```{r}
## using package abind
## add 1st matrix
library(abind)

# create empty array
empty <- array(numeric(),c(2,3,0)) 

# add matrix
empty = abind(empty, matrix(1:6, nrow=2, ncol=3))
empty
```

```{r}
## add second matrix, and so on
empty = abind(empty, matrix(9:14, nrow=2, ncol=3))
empty
```


```{r}
## add second matrix, and so on
empty = abind(empty, matrix(80:85, nrow=2, ncol=3))
empty
```
